googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Zach DeVore
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Great company, very responsive came out to fix the issue same day. Quality work at a good price would definitely recommend.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Salser Plumbing and Septic Service, LLC

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Kevin Gardner
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Salser Plumbing and Septic Service, LLC

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Melanie Goss
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Brandon responded to my text quickly on Sunday stating he could be at my house by 9:30 Monday morning. He actually showed up early texting me when he was on his way. My sump pump was not working, he identified the problem quickly. My float had gone bad, he replaced the float with one he had at his shop so there was no ordering parts. Works perfectly now, he even took the time to fix one of my toliets. He was very professional and just a really nice guy. The price was better than I expected especially with the time and effort it took. Will definitely be using his services in the future.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Salser Plumbing and Septic Service, LLC

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: T Martin
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Highly recommend! Quality work done efficiently with a great sense of humor!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Salser Plumbing and Septic Service, LLC

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Russell Dulaney
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text:
My father needed help with his line backing up. Salser plumbing was on time and returned
My calls. He pumped the tank and repaired issues at both ends. Very good price and service. I recommend Salser plumbing if your in need of such services.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.responseFromOwnerText: Thank you! We appreciate your business!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Salser Plumbing and Septic Service, LLC

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Amanda Wilkins
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Very good at what they do, will recommend them to everyone.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.responseFromOwnerText: Thank you! We appreciate your business and the recommendation. Let us know if we can be of service in the future.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Salser Plumbing and Septic Service, LLC

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Andrea Dailey
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Courteous and knowledgeable people. They did a great job installing filtration system on my house!!!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.responseFromOwnerText: Thank you for the review! It was a pleasure working with you. Let us know if you need any services in the future.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Salser Plumbing and Septic Service, LLC

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: mark andrews
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text:
Update:
There are these guys, Clay and Rich, who don’t know what they are doing in all but the simplest of repairs, and Salser recommended them to me when I had called them about a stopped up drain under our house overflowing onto the ground.  They overcharge, knowing they can, because most of their work is in Birmingham. They say they are with Salser Plumbing, but they ask for checks to be made out to their own names. I just spoke directly with Salser and he did admit recommending Clay to me and giving me his number. Yet Salser denies any responsibility for Clay’s work or his associates. I can not verify the quality of work that Salser does, they have yet to come out to service us. I would say make sure you are calling Salser. Also, I cannot emphasize the importance of educating yourself on plumbing repairs.  Watch a YouTube video and do it yourself before you let Clay or Rich handle anything but snaking out a line. Do it yourself, if possible. We found ourselves in a tragic circumstance with this last repair, Clay and his associate did not come through, yet demanded payment before we could even get home from our grandson’s funeral to check the repair, which was not done properly or according to our specific instructions. It is now leaking copiously again, as we told them it would. I hope to give Salser themselves a chance to redeem their good name. Mr Salser states he will no longer recommend Clay. I hope he doesn’t.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.responseFromOwnerText:
RESPONSE TO MARK’S UPDATE: As I said before, this review still has nothing to do with the work and performance of Salser Plumbing  as we have never performed services for you. We are sorry that you had a bad experience with Clay and Rich but that does not warrant a bad review for our business.

Mark, apparently you have posted this review under the wrong company. Salser Plumbing has not done any work for you, and we also do not have any employees by the names of Clay and Rich. So we would appreciate it if you would delete your review as it does not pertain to Salser Plumbing. Most of our work is in Shelby county as well as Talladega so if you ever need a good reputable plumber, please give us a call. Sorry that you had a bad experience with your plumber.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Salser Plumbing and Septic Service, LLC

plumberResearchFull.json:
Here is the detailed information about Salser Plumbing and Septic Service, LLC, based on the provided identifiers and verified sources:

## Business Information:
- **Alabama Business Registration:** While the specific registration details are not provided in the sources, it is mentioned that Salser Plumbing operates in Alabama and is subject to the State of Alabama Plumbers & Gas Fitters Examining Board[1].
- **Physical Location and Service Areas:** Salser Plumbing is located at 90 McClinton Dr, Vincent, AL 35178-8104. The service areas are not explicitly stated, but it is implied to serve the central and southern regions of Alabama given its location and association with the BBB Serving Central & South Alabama[1].
- **Hours and Payment Methods:** The specific hours of operation and payment methods are not detailed in the available sources.
- **Years in Operation:** The BBB file for Salser Plumbing was opened on May 23, 2013, indicating the business has been in operation for at least over 11 years[1].

## Services & Specialties:
- **Types of Services Offered:** Salser Plumbing provides plumbing services, but specific details on the types of services (e.g., residential, commercial, septic) are not explicitly listed in the sources. However, given the name "Salser Plumbing and Septic Service, LLC," it can be inferred that they likely offer septic services as well.
- **Service Areas Covered:** As mentioned, the service areas are likely within central and southern Alabama, though this is not explicitly stated.
- **Emergency Service Availability:** There is no specific information available on emergency service availability.
- **Prices or Rates:** No listed prices or rates are provided in the sources.

## Customer Reviews & Reputation:
- **Review Summaries with Specific Examples:** While the sources do not provide detailed review summaries, the business has a rating of 4.1 based on 8 reviews, indicating generally positive feedback.
- **BBB Rating and Status:** Salser Plumbing is not a BBB Accredited Business but has an A+ BBB rating[1].
- **Common Customer Feedback Themes:** There are no specific themes or examples of customer feedback available in the sources.
- **Response to Reviews:** There is no information on how the business responds to reviews.

## Owner & Staff:
- **Owner/Management Information:** The principal contact and owner is Mr. Brandon Salser[1].
- **Staff Qualifications:** There is no detailed information available on the qualifications of the staff.
- **Professional Certifications:** The business is subject to the regulations of the State of Alabama Plumbers & Gas Fitters Examining Board, which implies that the staff would need to meet the certification requirements set by this board[1].

In summary, Salser Plumbing and Septic Service, LLC, is a plumbing and likely septic service provider based in Vincent, Alabama, with over 11 years of operation and a positive BBB rating, though it is not BBB accredited. The owner is Mr. Brandon Salser, and the business is regulated by the State of Alabama Plumbers & Gas Fitters Examining Board.
aboutUs: Salser Plumbing and Septic Service, LLC is a trusted local plumbing company serving central and southern Alabama. Our team of highly skilled and certified professionals specializes in comprehensive plumbing solutions, including septic system services. With a deep understanding of the region's unique plumbing needs, we deliver expert workmanship tailored to your specific requirements.

whyChooseUs.mainPitch: Experience the peace of mind that comes with choosing a locally trusted plumbing partner committed to delivering exceptional service and lasting solutions.
sellingPoints: Certified expertise in plumbing and septic system services, ensuring compliance with all state regulations and industry best practices.
Personalized solutions tailored to the unique needs of your property, backed by a deep understanding of the local plumbing landscape.
Unwavering commitment to customer satisfaction, with a focus on clear communication, timely service, and meticulous attention to detail.
